name: R L
review: A welcoming church with a lot of young families. The founding pastor, Randy is a gifted teacher and there is a super talented worship band that plays mostly contemporary music. A robust children’s care and teaching program for all ages, and a great network of small groups for deeper study. Inspiring ministry.

name: Allison Hopkins
review: Easy parking and friendly people. My husband and I really like the pastor, Randy!

name: Tyler Somers
review: What I appreciate most about this group of people who follow Jesus is the mix of vulnerability & emphasis on identity, that those of us who trust in Jesus don’t go to church - rather we are the church, children of God, greatly loved, despite our wrongs.
